Peter the Iberian
Pierre l’Ibère
Individual Saint
Peter the Iberian was the son of the king of Georgia. He helped Nestorious preach a homily about the saints. He went on a pilgrimage to Jerusalem and became a monk. He became bishop of Maiuma in Gaza and was exiled to Egypt in 455. Bishop of Maiumensis
